member.name: T:Program
member.summary: The Program class provides helpers to control the program execution.

member.name: M:Delay
member.summary: Delays program execution by the specified amount of MilliSeconds.

member.name: M:GetArgument
member.summary: Returns the specified argument passed to this program.
member.returns: The command-line argument at the specified index.

member.name: P:ArgumentCount
member.summary: Gets the number of command-line arguments passed to this program.
